chat_history.content:
**Day 1-3: Denver**

**Day 1: Arrival in Denver**
There were no direct flights available between Devils Lake and Denver on your desired travel date of March 22nd, 2022. Please check if you can be flexible with your travel dates as this may open up more options. Once you arrive in Denver, you can take a look at the following accommodation options, all of which are available for your preferred minimum stay of one night:
- **Entire home/apt** - Harlem cozy nights for $457 with a 4.0-star review rating
- **Private room** - Studio Style Basement in Shared Apartment for $498 with a 5.0-star review rating
- **Private room** - Bright room in Williamsburg loft for $636 with a 4.0-star review rating
- **Private room** - Room in Spacious Williamsburg Loft for $934 with a 4.0-star review rating
- **Private room** - Quaint & Charming 2BR + Futon for $897 with a 1.0-star review rating
- **Entire home/apt** - Peaceful, beautiful home away for $414 with a 1.0-star review rating
- **Entire home/apt** - Big Sunny Bushwick Apartment for $714 with a 2.0-star review rating
- **Entire home/apt** - *NO GUEST SERVICE FEE* Luxury Studio Suite w/ Free Continental Breakfast for $390 with a 2.0-star review rating

**Day 2: Exploring Denver**
Denver has plenty of attractions to keep you busy. Here are a few options:
- **Denver Zoo** - located at 2300 Steele St, Denver, CO 80205, USA. Phone: (720) 337-1400. Website: https://denverzoo.org/
- **Denver Botanic Gardens** - located at 1007 York St, Denver, CO 80206, USA. Phone: (720) 865-3500. Website: https://www.botanicgardens.org/
- **Denver Art Museum** - located at 100 W 14th Ave Pkwy, Denver, CO 80204, USA. Phone: (720) 865-5000. Website: https://denverartmuseum.org/
- **Denver Museum of Nature & Science** - located at 2001 Colorado Blvd, Denver, CO 80205, USA. Phone: (303) 370-6000. Website: https://www.dmns.org/
- **Molly Brown House Museum** - located at 1340 Pennsylvania St, Denver, CO 80203, USA. Phone: (303) 832-4092. Website: https://mollybrown.org/
- **Big Blue Bear** - located at 750-776 14th St, Denver, CO 80202, USA. Website: http://bluebearstudios.com/
- **Elitch Gardens** - located at 2000 Elitch Cir, Denver, CO 80204, USA. Phone: (303) 595-4386. Website: https://www.elitchgardens.com/
- **Clyfford Still Museum** - located at 1250 Bannock St, Denver, CO 80204, USA. Phone: (720) 354-4880. Website: https://clyffordstillmuseum.org/
- **History Colorado Center** - located at 1200 Broadway, Denver, CO 80203, USA. Phone: (303) 447-8679. Website: https://www.historycolorado.org/history-colorado-center?utm_source=GoogleBusinessListing
- **Historic Elitch Carousel Dome** - located at 3775 Tennyson St, Denver, CO 80212, USA.
- **Beyond Light Show** - located at 400 S Logan St, Denver, CO 80209, USA. Website: http://www.beyondlightshow.com/
- **Colorado State Capitol** - located at 200 E Colfax Ave, Denver, CO 80203, USA. Phone: (303) 866-2604. Website: https://www.colorado.gov/pacific/capitol
- **Meow Wolf Denver | Convergence Station** - located at 1338 1st St, Denver, CO 80204, USA. Phone: (866) 636-9969. Website: https://tickets.meowwolf.com/denver/#gbp
- **Kirkland Museum of Fine & Decorative Art** - located at 1201 Bannock St, Denver, CO 80204, USA. Phone: (303) 832-8576. Website: http://www.kirklandmuseum.org/
- **City Park** - located at 2001 Colorado Blvd, Denver, CO 80205, USA. Phone: (720) 913-1311. Website: http://www.denver.org/listings/City-Park/6822/
- **Forney Museum of Transportation** - located at 4303 Brighton Blvd, Denver, CO 80216, USA. Phone: (303) 297-1113. Website: http://www.forneymuseum.org/
- **Four Mile Historic Park** - located at 715 S Forest St, Denver, CO 80246, USA. Phone: (720) 865-0800. Website: http://fourmilepark.org/
- **Confluence Park** - located at 2250 15th St, Denver, CO 80202, USA. Phone: (720) 913-1311. Website: http://www.denver.org/things-to-do/sports-recreation/denver-parks/
- **Denver Selfie Museum** - located at 1531 Stout St Suite 102, Denver, CO 80202, USA. Phone: (303) 328-0104. Website: https://denverselfiemuseum.com/
- **Wings Over the Rockies Air & Space Museum** - located at 7711 E Academy Blvd, Denver, CO 80230, USA. Phone: (303) 360-5360. Website: http://wingsmuseum.org/

When it comes to dinner, Denver has some great restaurant options too, for various budgets and cuisines such as:
- **The Fatty Bao - Asian Gastro Bar** - offering Bakery, BBQ, Cafe, Indian, and Seafood, with an average cost of $93 and a 4.7-star aggregate rating.
- **The Urban Socialite** - offering Cafe, Indian, Desserts, and Italian, with an average cost of $34 and a 3.8-star aggregate rating.

- **Al Yousuf** - offering Desserts, Tea, Pizza, French, and American, with an average cost of $32 and a 3.7-star aggregate rating.
- **Sweet Sensations** - offering Tea, Pizza, BBQ, and Italian, with an average cost of $14 and a 0.0-star aggregate rating.
- **Starve Stalkers** - offering Fast Food, Indian, BBQ, and Seafood, with an average cost of $31 and a 0.0-star aggregate rating.
- **Rain Tree Grill** - offering Tea, Mexican, BBQ, and Italian, with an average cost of $94 and a 3.2-star aggregate rating.
- **Yakooz** - offering Pizza, Bakery, Fast Food, Cafe, and American, with an average cost of $52 and a 3.1-star aggregate rating.
- **Nathu's Sweets** - offering Tea, Bakery, BBQ, and Fast Food, with an average cost of $12 and a 2.1-star aggregate rating.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
